name: as
signature: { <B>(b: B): <X>(self: Option<X>) => Option<B>; <X, B>(self: Option<X>, b: B): Option<B>; }
description:
Replaces the value inside a `Some` with the specified constant value, leaving
`None` unchanged.
*Details This function transforms an `Option` by replacing the value inside a `Some`
with the given constant value `b`. If the `Option` is `None`, it remains
unchanged. This is useful when you want to preserve the presence of a value (`Some`) but
replace its content with a fixed value.
